metadata.Title: CVE-2022-30629 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Non-random values for ticket_age_add in session tickets in crypto/tls before Go 1.17.11 and Go 1.18.3 allow an attacker that can observe TLS handshakes to correlate successive connections by comparing ticket ages during session resumption.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-30629` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-1.18 - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1~18.04.4
golang-1.18-go - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1~18.04.4
golang-1.18-src - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1~18.04.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: golang-1.18 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.18.1-1ubuntu1~18.04.4').
